name: vscode-taskexplorer
description: Tasks management for npm, vscode, yarn, ant, gradle, grunt, gulp, batch, bash,php composer, make, maven, python, perl, powershell, ruby, pipenv, nsis, jenkins. Supports external task providers via API.

scripts.build-prod:analyze: webpack --mode production --env analyze --config ./webpack.config.js && npm run view-statistics
scripts.build-extension-prod:analyze: webpack --mode production --env build=taskexplorer --env analyze --config ./webpack.config.js && npm run view-statistics
scripts.clean-all: npm run clean-all_keep_wp_cache && npm run clean-webpack_cache
scripts.clean-all_keep_wp_cache: npm run clean-build && npm run clean-tests:build && npm run clean-types:all
scripts.clean-build: npm run clean-extension-all && npm run clean-webviews
scripts.clean-extension-all: rimraf dist && rimraf node_modules/.cache/tsconfig.node.tsbuildinfo && rimraf node_modules/.cache/tsconfig.web.tsbuildinfo && rimraf %TEMP%\vscode-taskexplorer && rimraf node_modules/.cache/wpbuild/global.json
scripts.clean-extension-all_and_cache: npm run clean-extension-all && npm run clean-extension-plugin_cache-all
scripts.clean-extension-all_and_devcache: npm run clean-extension-all && npm run clean-extension-plugin_cache-dev
scripts.clean-extension-all_and_prodcache: npm run clean-extension-all && npm run clean-extension-plugin_cache-prod
scripts.clean-extension-all_and_testcache: npm run clean-extension-all && npm run clean-extension-plugin_cache-test
scripts.clean-tests: npm run clean-tests:build && npm run clean-tests:cache
scripts.clean-types:all: npm run clean-types && npm run clean-types:bundle
scripts.clean-webviews: rimraf res/css && rimraf res/js && rimraf res/page && rimraf node_modules/.cache/tsconfig.webview.tsbuildinfo
scripts.copy-all-to-code: npm run copy-precopy-backup && npm run copy-res-to-code && npm run copy-pkgjson-to-code && npm run copy-build-to-code
scripts.rebuild-prod: npm run clean-all && webpack --mode production --env clean --config ./webpack.config.js
scripts.rebuild-dev: npm run clean-all && webpack --mode development --env clean --config ./webpack.config.js
scripts.rebuild-test: npm run clean-all && webpack --mode none --env mode=test  --env clean --config ./webpack.config.js
scripts.rebuild-test_suite: npm run clean-tests:build && npm run build-test-suite
scripts.rebuild-test_suite:wp: npm run clean-tests:build && npm run build-test-suite:wp
scripts.rebuild-extension-prod: npm run clean-extension-all && npm run clean-extension-plugin_cache-prod && webpack --mode production --env build=taskexplorer --env clean --config ./webpack.config.js
scripts.rebuild-extension-web: npm run clean-extension-all && npm run clean-extension-plugin_cache-prod && webpack --mode production --env clean --env build=taskexplorer --env target=web --config ./webpack.config.js
scripts.rebuild-extension-dev: npm run clean-extension-all && npm run clean-extension-plugin_cache-dev && webpack --mode development --env build=taskexplorer --env clean --config ./webpack.config.js
scripts.rebuild-extension-test: npm run clean-extension-all && npm run clean-extension-plugin_cache-test && npm run clean-tests:build && webpack --mode none --env build=taskexplorer --env mode=test  --env clean --config ./webpack.config.js
scripts.rebuild-types: npm run clean-types && npm run build-types
scripts.rebuild-types:wp: npm run clean-types && npm run build-types:wp
scripts.test-all-default: npm run clean-tests:cache && npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-all-run
scripts.test-all-multi_root: npm run clean-tests:cache && npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-all-run:multi_root
scripts.test-all-sws:mws: npm run clean-tests:cache && npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-all-run && node ./dist/test/runTest.js --no-clean --multi-root
scripts.test-single-multi_root-ant: npm run build-extension-test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js ant xDeactivate --multi-root
scripts.test-single-multi_root-filecache: npm run build-extension-test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js fileCache xDeactivate --multi-root
scripts.test-single-multi_root-filewatcher: npm run build-extension-test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js fileWatcher xDeactivate --multi-root
scripts.test-single-multi_root-taskmonitor: npm run build-extension-test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js taskMonitor xDeactivate --multi-root
scripts.test-single-multi_root-multiroot: npm run build-extension-test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js multiRoot xDeactivate --multi-root
scripts.test-single-multi_root-tasks: npm run build-extension-test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js tasks xDeactivate --multi-root
scripts.test-single-ant: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-ant
scripts.test-single-apppublisher: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-apppublisher
scripts.test-single-bash: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-bash
scripts.test-single-batch: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-batch
scripts.test-single-composer: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-composer
scripts.test-single-configuration: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-configuration
scripts.test-single-externalprovider: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-externalprovider
scripts.test-single-filecache: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-filecache
scripts.test-single-filewatcher: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-filewatcher
scripts.test-single-gradle: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-gradle
scripts.test-single-grunt: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-grunt
scripts.test-single-gulp: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-gulp
scripts.test-single-init: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-init
scripts.test-single-jenkins: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-jenkins
scripts.test-single-licensemgr: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-licensemgr
scripts.test-single-makefile: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-makefile
scripts.test-single-maven: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-maven
scripts.test-single-menucommands: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-menucommands
scripts.test-single-multiroot: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-multiroot
scripts.test-single-noscripts: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-noscripts
scripts.test-single-npm: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-npm
scripts.test-single-nsis: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-nsis
scripts.test-single-perl: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-perl
scripts.test-single-parsingreport: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-parsingreport
scripts.test-single-pipenv: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-pipenv
scripts.test-single-powershell: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-powershell
scripts.test-single-providers: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-providers
scripts.test-single-python: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-python
scripts.test-single-releasenotes: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-releasenotes
scripts.test-single-ruby: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-ruby
scripts.test-single-server: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-server
scripts.test-single-task: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-task
scripts.test-single-taskdetailspage: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-taskdetailspage
scripts.test-single-taskmonitor: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-taskmonitor
scripts.test-single-tree: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-tree
scripts.test-single-treegrouping: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-treegrouping
scripts.test-single-typescript: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-typescript
scripts.test-single-webpack: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-webpack
scripts.test-single-webview: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-webview
scripts.test-single-workspace: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-workspace
scripts.test-single-wrapper: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-wrapper
scripts.test-single-util: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-single-run-util
scripts.test-hook-before: npm run build-extension-test && npm run test-hook-before_2
scripts.tsc-typecheck-all: npm run tsc-typecheck-extension && npm run tsc-typecheck-extension:web && npm run tsc-typecheck-tests && npm run tsc-typecheck-webviews

walkthroughs.title: Get Started with Task Explorer
walkthroughs.description: Run, track, view and organize all of your project scripts and tasks

steps.title: Read Tutorial
steps.description:
Read the Welcome Tutorial.

[Open Tutorial](command:taskexplorer.view.welcome.show?false "Read the Welcome Tutorial")

steps.title: Customize your experience with a variety of settings
steps.description:
An organized settings section to easily customize the way Task Explorer works.

[Open Settings](command:taskexplorer.openSettings "Open the Task Explorer Extension Settings")

steps.title: Support development by purchasing a license
steps.description:
Support ongoing development by purchasing a license.

[Learn about Task Explorer licensing](command:taskexplorer.view.licensePage.show?false "Open the Licensing details page")

commands.title: Task Explorer: Show Log in Output Window
Task Explorer: Show Error Log in Output Window

explorer/context.when: taskexplorer:enabled && explorerViewletVisible && filesExplorerFocus && !explorerResourceIsRoot && !inputFocus && resourceScheme == file && resourcePath in taskexplorer:fileCache:taskFiles
taskexplorer:enabled && explorerViewletVisible && filesExplorerFocus && !explorerResourceIsRoot && !inputFocus && resourceScheme == file && resourcePath not in taskexplorer:fileCache:taskFiles
taskexplorer:enabled && explorerViewletVisible && filesExplorerFocus && !explorerResourceIsRoot && !inputFocus && resourceScheme == file && resourcePath in taskexplorer:fileCache:taskFiles
taskexplorer:enabled && explorerViewletVisible && filesExplorerFocus && !explorerResourceIsRoot && !inputFocus && resourcePath && resourceScheme == folder
taskexplorer:enabled && explorerViewletVisible && filesExplorerFocus && !explorerResourceIsRoot && !inputFocus && resourceScheme == file && resourcePath not in taskexplorer:fileCache:taskFiles
taskexplorer:enabled && explorerViewletVisible && filesExplorerFocus && !explorerResourceIsRoot && !inputFocus && resourcePath && resourceScheme == folder

taskexplorer:enabled && config.taskexplorer.enableExplorerView && explorerViewletVisible && filesExplorerFocus && !explorerResourceIsRoot && !inputFocus && resourceScheme == file && resourcePath in taskexplorer:fileCache:scriptFiles

taskexplorer:enabled && config.taskexplorer.enableExplorerView && explorerViewletVisible && filesExplorerFocus && !explorerResourceIsRoot && !inputFocus && resourceScheme == file && resourcePath in taskexplorer:tasks:scriptFilesWithArgs

beginsPattern.regexp: ^\[(?:0|1)\] \d{1,2}\:\d{1,2}\:\d{1,2} (?:AM|PM) \- (Starting compilation in watch mode|File change detected\. Starting incremental compilation)\.\.\.

endsPattern.regexp: ^\[(?:0|1)\] \d{1,2}\:\d{1,2}\:\d{1,2} (?:AM|PM) \- (?:Compilation complete\.|Found \d+ errors?\.) Watching for file changes\.

pattern.regexp:
^The terminal process *["']?([A-Za-z\.0-9\/\-_\\]+) +([A-Za-z \.0-9\/\-_\\"']+) +(?:failed to launch \(|terminated with )exit code\:? *([0-9]+)\s*(?:\.|\))[
]{2,3}^(.+)
^('(.+)' is not recognized as an internal or external command)
